author: Alison Snyder, Eileen Drage O'Reilly
title: Researchers are testing new approaches in the race for a coronavirus vaccine
description: In the race to create a vaccine for the novel coronavirus, some researchers are testing new approaches they hope can ultimately produce vaccines in months rather than years.Why it matters: The global COVID-19 outbreak is a harsh reminder of the urgent need to…
content:
In the race to create a vaccine for the novel coronavirus, some researchers are testing new approaches they hope can ultimately produce vaccines in months rather than years.
